|  --- | --- |
|  [AxisType](./chart-def.axistype.md) | Sets the type of an axis. |
|  [ChartType](./chart-def.charttype.md) | Sets the type of chart to output. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IAnnotationLabelStyle](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.md) | Sets the style for the annotation's label. |
|  [IAnnotationStyle](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.md) | A style that can be applied to an annotation. |
|  [IAnnotationStyles](./chart-def.iannotationstyles.md) | Named styles that can be applied to annotations. |
|  [IAxisConfig](./chart-def.iaxisconfig.md) | Configures an axis of the chart. |
|  [IAxisLabelConfig](./chart-def.iaxislabelconfig.md) | Defines the configuration of an axis label. |
|  [IAxisMap](./chart-def.iaxismap.md) | Maps the columns in a dataframe to axis in the chart. |
|  [IAxisSeriesConfig](./chart-def.iaxisseriesconfig.md) | Relates a single axis to data series. |
|  [IAxisTicksConfiguration](./chart-def.iaxisticksconfiguration.md) | Configuration for axis tick marks. |
|  [IChartDef](./chart-def.ichartdef.md) | A chart definition that is suitable for serialization to JSON and transfer to the browser via REST API. Can be used to instantiate a chart in the browser. |
|  [IDataLabels](./chart-def.idatalabels.md) | Configure labels that are applied to each data point. |
|  [IFontConfig](./chart-def.ifontconfig.md) | Configures the font for a label. |
|  [ILegendConfig](./chart-def.ilegendconfig.md) | Configures the legend of the chart. |
|  [IPadding](./chart-def.ipadding.md) | Sets padding. |
|  [IPlotConfig](./chart-def.iplotconfig.md) | Defines the chart. |
|  [ISeriesLabelConfig](./chart-def.iserieslabelconfig.md) | Configures the label for a series. |
|  [IXAxisConfig](./chart-def.ixaxisconfig.md) | Configures the X axis of the chart. |
|  [IYAxisConfig](./chart-def.iyaxisconfig.md) | Configures a Y axis of the chart. |
|  [IYAxisSeriesConfig](./chart-def.iyaxisseriesconfig.md) | Relates a single Y axis to data series. |
